house_listing.house_description: Fabulous eat-in kitchen w/center island, tile flr, indirect lights! Charming victorian w/big front porch, distance water views frm rear, central air, gas heat, gleaming hdwd flrs, updated baths, beaded board vinyl siding, super location! Perfect for singles or couples!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Balcony, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Microwave, Pantry,Victorian Style
